description: Use the SearchGroups operation to search groups in a specified Amazon QuickSight namespace using the supplied filters.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that the group is in. Currently, you use the ID for the Amazon Web Services account that contains your Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace that you want to search.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The structure for the search filters that you want to apply to your search. (dict) --- A GroupSearchFilter object that you want to apply to your search. The comparison operator that you want to use as a filter, for example "Operator": "StartsWith". Currently, the only supported operator is StartsWith. The name of the value that you want to use as a filter, for example "Name": "GROUP_NAME". Currently, the only supported name is GROUP_NAME. The value of the named item, in this case GROUP_NAME, that you want to use as a filter.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The comparison operator that you want to use as a filter, for example "Operator": "StartsWith". Currently, the only supported operator is StartsWith.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the value that you want to use as a filter, for example "Name": "GROUP_NAME". Currently, the only supported name is GROUP_NAME.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the named item, in this case GROUP_NAME, that you want to use as a filter.

nested_items.name: GroupList
nested_items.description: A list of groups in a specified namespace that match the filters you set in your SearchGroups request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the group.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The principal ID of the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token that can be used in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
